## Checklist
<!-- Verify táº¥t cáº£ items trÆ°á»›c khi submit -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project conventions (.ai/rules/)
- [ ] SwiftLint passes with no warnings
- [ ] No force unwrapping (!)
- [ ] No commented-out code
- [ ] No debug print statements
- [ ] No sensitive data hardcoded
- [ ] Error handling implemented
- [ ] Loading states handled
- [ ] Empty states handled

### Documentation
- [ ] Code comments added (Vietnamese)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated
- [ ] API documentation updated (if needed)

### Testing & Quality
- [ ] All unit tests pass
- [ ] All UI tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Code coverage meets requirements (80%+)
- [ ] No memory leaks (tested with Instruments)
- [ ] No performance regressions
- [ ] Accessibility verified

### Security & Privacy
- [ ] No sensitive data in logs
- [ ] API keys not hardcoded
- [ ] User data handled securely
- [ ] Privacy policy compliant

### Review
- [ ] Self-reviewed the diff
- [ ] Rebased on latest develop
- [ ] No merge conflicts
- [ ] PR description is clear
- [ ] Reviewers assigned
